title: Google\Cloud\Bigtable\Admin\V2\EncryptionInfo
name: EncryptionInfo
description:
Encryption information for a given resource.

If this resource is protected with customer managed encryption, the in-use Cloud Key Management Service (Cloud KMS) key version is specified along with its status.

Generated from protobuf message google.bigtable.admin.v2.EncryptionInfo

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.encryption_type
params.description: Output only. The type of encryption used to protect this resource.

params.name: data.encryption_status
params.description: Output only. The status of encrypt/decrypt calls on underlying data for this resource. Regardless of status, the existing data is always encrypted at rest.

params.name: data.kms_key_version
params.description: Output only. The version of the Cloud KMS key specified in the parent cluster that is in use for the data underlying this table.
